title: Artificial intelligence: Experts propose guidelines for safe systems
description: A new voluntary framework has the backing of hundreds of experts around the world.

title: AI: Workers need more protection - TUC union
description: The warning comes as Octopus Energy's boss says customers prefer emails written by AI over humans.

title: UK set to amend encrypted message scanning plans
description: Proposed new privacy safeguard for planned powers to scan encrypted messages for child abuse images.

title: Facebook-owner Meta exec Nick Clegg says AI 'quite stupid'
description: Meta's president of global affairs Sir Nick Clegg has downplayed the risks of current AI technology.

title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Concern over French plan for AI surveillance
description: CCTV will use algorithms to detect fights and abandoned bags - but not everyone is happy about it.
